title: Topic 001 Question 132
body: A company’s website provides users with downloadable historical performance reports. The website needs a solution that will scale to meet the company’s website demands globally. The solution should be cost-effective, limit the provisioning of infrastructure resources, and provide the fastest possible response time.
Which combination should a solutions architect recommend to meet these requirements?
options: Application Load Balancer with Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling
Amazon Route 53 with internal Application Load Balancers
